item.title: Let's E-commerce becomes a Better Customer Experience
item.description: Photo Source: Pexels. Creative Commons Latest Video Real-Time Communications can be decisive to improve e-commerce services. First of all, because they are becoming very accessible and easy to use through web browsers or most of mobile devices. Plugin downloads are no longer required, you just click and your are connected. Secondly, remember that creating a live interaction with your customers like a live chat or video call channels is a proven way to increase your sales.

item.title: Live Video Calling: The New Eye Witness for Insurance Companies
item.description: Photo source: Pexels. Creative Commons The popularity of Live Video Calling is increasing quickly in the view of the fact that it can help to provide a better customer service and reduce costs. One of the most growing sectors in applying live video is insurance businesses. Access to convenience. Customers expect to use the more convenient channel at every moment. Thanks to new technologies like WebRTC it is not necessary to make a prior appointment and move to a real office.

item.title: Amazon's Mayday Button. The Road to the Future
item.description: Five years ago, Amazon launched the Mayday button to its line of Kindle Fire tablets. It provides on-device tech support all day, every day. Just by tapping the Mayday button the Kindle user is put in direct contact with an Amazon technician. In less than six months, the feature became the most popular way for Kindle customers to contact Amazonâ€™s customer service. What are the ingredients for success? First of all, it gives customers the option of reaching out to a real person.
